text: Brayan Yohangel Hurtado Cortesía (born 21 June 1999) is a Venezuelan footballer who plays as a forward for the Portland Timbers 2, on loan from Mineros de Guayana. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="5"|Mineros de Guayana |2016 |rowspan="4"|Venezuelan Primera División |3||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||3||0 |- |2017 |33||9||6Appearances in the Copa Venezuela||3||colspan="2"|–||0||0||39||12 |- |2018 |25||5||0||0||2Appearances in the Copa Sudamericana||0||0||0||27||5 |- |2019 |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||1||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !62!!14!!6!!3!!2!!0!!0!!0!!70!!17 |- |Portland Timbers 2 (loan) |2019 |USL Championship |26||7||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||26||7 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !88!!21!!6!!3!!2!!0!!0!!0!!96!!24 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan footballers Category:Venezuelan expatriate footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Mineros de Guayana players Category:Portland Timbers 2 players Category:Venezuelan expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:USL Championship players
title: Brayan Hurtado
